product_name: DERMA ERetinol Line Smoothing Hydro Gel Patches
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackRetinol Line Smoothing Hydro Gel Patches target wrinkles and crow's feet-without irritation-with a proprietary blend of Retinol + Bakuchiol. Derma E's dermatologist recommended formula is infused with Rose Water and REAL hibiscus flowers to soothe and plump undereyes with nourishing hydration.
details: DetailsBenefitsMinimizes the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and crow's feetPlumps with soothing hydrationNon-irritating and ideal for sensitive skinKey IngredientsRetinol + Bakuchiol: minimizes the look of fine lines, wrinkles, and crow's feet without irritationHibiscus Flower Petals: soothes and calmsRose Water: tones, refreshes, and hydratesArginine: supports collagen healthItem 2635046How To UsePlace gel patch onto clean, dry undereye area for 10 minutes in the evening. Discard after use and pat remaining serum into skin. For external use only. Recommended to use face sunscreen in the morning.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Carrageenan, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Pentylene Glycol, Pinus Sylvestris Leaf Extract, Propanediol, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Calcium Chloride, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Allantoin, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Sucrose, Potassium Chloride, Illicium Verum (Anise) Fruit Extract,Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Calcium Lactate, Rosa Centifolia Flower Powder, Adenosine, Arginine, CI 77491, Ethylhexylglycerin, Bakuchiol, Cellulose Gum, Sodium Phytate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lecithin, Polysorbate 20, Retinol, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8.
how_to_use: Place gel patch onto clean, dry undereye area for 10 minutes in the evening. Discard after use and pat remaining serum into skin. For external use only. Recommended to use face sunscreen in the morning.

reviews.headline: Eyes are brighter
reviews.comments: My eyes look much younger and better rested after use. I use in the am and havent had any issues with sunburn.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: I am not one who normally leaves a review, but after reading the reviews here I decided to try this and WOW!!  I literally saw results after my first application.  I have tried a number of Derma E products and have been extremely happy with the results, and the price.  This is definitely a great product that I will buy over and over:

reviews.headline: The Best!
reviews.comments: Derma-E products have become my favorite.  Since I've been exclusively using them, I have received so many compliments on the appearance of my skin.  These are definitely the best eye patches I've ever tried.  At the age of 42, I have mature skin. These patches plump and hydrate my skin all day long. Seriously LOVE!!

reviews.headline: Love them!
reviews.comments: These are perfect to use if you need to reduce the puffiness under your eyes quickly. Perfect for a morning after too much wine or a rough night of sleep!

reviews.headline: Perfect start to the day
reviews.comments: I used these everyday for a week and definitely noticed a difference. Perfect way to start the day and get ready for lots of zoom calls !

reviews.headline: Great Under Eye Product
reviews.comments: I recently tried the Derma E Retinol Line Smoothing Eye Patches, and I loved them.  These eye patches are incredibly effective at reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles around the eyes. After just a few uses, I noticed my under-eye area looked smoother and more refreshed. The patches are easy to apply and stay in place without slipping. Overall, I highly recommend these eye patches for anyone looking to rejuvenate their eye area and achieve a more youthful look.

reviews.headline: Hydrating eye patches
reviews.comments: These eye patches really helped w/hydration on those cold ,dry days. Didn't slip off when l put them on overnight

reviews.headline: Love these!
reviews.comments: They always make my skin look so hydrated after

reviews.headline: Yesssss!
reviews.comments: Love the texture and how simple it is to apply. This helped bring my face back to life.

reviews.headline: Awesome Product
reviews.comments: I love these under eye pads! They smooth the under eye lines very well and they're long lasting. I highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Great for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: I have very sensitive skin and these were so cooling and actually worked!!

reviews.headline: I will buy these again
reviews.comments: I love how cooling these feel! They stay on really well and my skin looks great after.
